tool_description: Flag.es provides a visitor counting widget that shows the most recent visitors, the flags of their countries, and the names of their cities, as determined by their IP addresses. This widget can be embedded on the user's website by copying and pasting some JavaScript code. This code can be edited to alter the counter's general appearance, the information displayed, and the number of seconds that must pass before an old visitor can be counted again. The Flag.es Flag Counter uses GeoLite data provided by MaxMind.
name: flags.es Flag Counter
title: flags.es Flag Counter

api_list.name: /cgi-bin/geoip/amiip.pl
api_list.description: Access the flags.es API without Javascript

required_parameters.name: curl
required_parameters.description: Url which is calling the Endpoint, Example: http://www.flags.es
